lead_paragraph: Stocks rose with the price of oil climbed, boosting energy stocks. Salesforce.com and Best Buy were among the biggest gainers after reporting earnings that exceeded forecasts.

headline.print_headline: Oil Prices Lift Market in Quiet Trading
headline.main: Market Inches Ahead, Tugged Along by Rising Oil Prices

snippet: Stocks rose with the price of oil climbed, boosting energy stocks. Salesforce.com and Best Buy were among the biggest gainers after reporting earnings that exceeded forecasts.
abstract: Stock market ends with record close due to boost given to energy stocks by rising oil prices.
